pre_caption: This is a fast-moving, hyperlapse-style shot through a European city street at dusk. The video is characterized by a strong motion blur effect, particularly at the edges of the frame, as the camera moves swiftly forward. The scene features classic architecture, pedestrians, and scooters along the wet-looking pavement.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
